welcome.title: Hi, I'm Cline
welcome.description1: I can do all kinds of tasks thanks to breakthroughs in
welcome.description3: agentic coding capabilities and access to tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use a browser, and execute terminal commands
welcome.description5: I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
welcome.signup_prompt: Sign up for an account to get started for free, or use an API key that provides access to models like Claude Sonnet.
